docs.snippet: Will Shortz challenges us to find as many six-letter words as possible....
docs.abstract: Will Shortz challenges us to find as many six-letter words as possible.

docs.snippet: Outgoing Formula One champion Sebastian Vettel and Australian team mate Daniel Ricciardo were sent to the back of the grid at the season-ending Abu Dhabi Grand Prix on Saturday after stewards ruled Red Bull had used an illegal front wing....

headline.main: Red Bull Drivers Sent to Back of Grid
headline.print_headline: Red Bull Drivers Sent to Back of Grid

docs.lead_paragraph: Outgoing Formula One champion Sebastian Vettel and Australian team mate Daniel Ricciardo were sent to the back of the grid at the season-ending Abu Dhabi Grand Prix on Saturday after stewards ruled Red Bull had used an illegal front wing.

docs.snippet: Scotland ran in five tries and conceded none for an emphatic 37-12 win over Tonga at Kilmarnock on Saturday, the first test involving a major rugby nation to be played on an artificial pitch....

headline.main: Scotland Crush Tonga in Five-Try Rout
headline.print_headline: Scotland Crush Tonga in Five-Try Rout

docs.lead_paragraph: Scotland ran in five tries and conceded none for an emphatic 37-12 win over Tonga at Kilmarnock on Saturday, the first test involving a major rugby nation to be played on an artificial pitch.

docs.snippet: Flights have resumed at Detroit Metropolitan Airport after icy runways kept planes from arriving and departing....

headline.main: Flights Resume at Detroit Airport After Ice Delays
headline.print_headline: Flights Resume at Detroit Airport After Ice Delays

docs.lead_paragraph: Flights have resumed at Detroit Metropolitan Airport after icy runways kept planes from arriving and departing.

docs.snippet: Colombian President Juan Manuel Santos said he hoped next week to secure the release of five captives, including an army general, held by Marxist FARC rebels, a move that will allow stalled peace talks to continue....

headline.main: Colombia's Santos Says FARC Release of Hostages Will Be Next Week
headline.print_headline: Colombia's Santos Says FARC Release of Hostages Will Be Next Week

docs.lead_paragraph: Colombian President Juan Manuel Santos said he hoped next week to secure the release of five captives, including an army general, held by Marxist FARC rebels, a move that will allow stalled peace talks to continue.

docs.snippet: Borussia Dortmund winger Marco Reus was taken off injured midway through the second half of their Bundesliga game against Paderborn after earlier scoring on his comeback from an ankle injury....

headline.main: Borussia Dortmund's Reus Injured on Comeback
headline.print_headline: Borussia Dortmund's Reus Injured on Comeback

docs.lead_paragraph: Borussia Dortmund winger Marco Reus was taken off injured midway through the second half of their Bundesliga game against Paderborn after earlier scoring on his comeback from an ankle injury.

docs.snippet: A Saudi inmate held for 12 years at the U.S. prison at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, on suspicion of fighting in Afghanistan for al Qaeda has been transferred to Saudi Arabia, the U.S. Defense Department said on Saturday....

headline.main: U.S. Releases Guantanamo Prisoner to Saudi Arabia
headline.print_headline: U.S. Releases Guantanamo Prisoner to Saudi Arabia

docs.lead_paragraph: A Saudi inmate held for 12 years at the U.S. prison at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, on suspicion of fighting in Afghanistan for al Qaeda has been transferred to Saudi Arabia, the U.S. Defense Department said on Saturday.

docs.snippet: South Africa claimed an unconvincing 22-6 victory over Italy on Saturday with a late try from Bryan Habana adding some respectability to a lacklustre performance in Padova....

headline.main: Sloppy Springboks Battle Past Brave Italy
headline.print_headline: Sloppy Springboks Battle Past Brave Italy

docs.lead_paragraph: South Africa claimed an unconvincing 22-6 victory over Italy on Saturday with a late try from Bryan Habana adding some respectability to a lacklustre performance in Padova.

docs.snippet: A man whose New York City murder conviction was overturned after he spent over 20 years in prison is getting $3.6 million from the state....

headline.main: Man Freed After 2 Decades in Prison to Get $3.6M
headline.print_headline: Man Freed After 2 Decades in Prison to Get $3.6M

docs.lead_paragraph: A man whose New York City murder conviction was overturned after he spent over 20 years in prison is getting $3.6 million from the state.

docs.snippet: When it comes to controlling California's flashy Las Vegas-style casinos, the stakes are enormous for tribes who own the gambling operations that collectively generate billions of dollars a year to sustain Native Americans up and down the state....

headline.main: California Indian Casinos Embroiled in Turmoil
headline.print_headline: California Indian Casinos Embroiled in Turmoil

docs.lead_paragraph: When it comes to controlling California's flashy Las Vegas-style casinos, the stakes are enormous for tribes who own the gambling operations that collectively generate billions of dollars a year to sustain Native Americans up and down the state.
